txt.en: Defeat the dread-wight Adâru-guzi in Esh-kimâkhi.
Search the great tombs of Esh-kimâkhi for any sign of the final traveller.
Search the grounds of Adakûr near the crypts of Esh-kimâkhi for signs of the quartet of travellers.
You find three travellers dead, and hear the screech of restless crypt-horrors near you
Search the great tombs of Esh-kimâkhi for any sign of the final traveller
Some travellers have gone missing after venturing near the crypts of Esh-kimâkhi. You are tasked with investigating the area around the crypts for signs of these travellers.

'You ended the threat of the crypt-wights? That is welcome news indeed. It is a shame about the travellers. Now we should leave this place, and quickly. There is a foreboding chill near these crypts.'
Adâru-guzi lets out a roar of challenge
Adâru-guzi lets out a roar of challenge
